laboratory_examinations.findings: Low albumin level (3.0 g/dL) upon admission; dropped to a low of 12.9 g/dL during hospitalization.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Remained almost unchanged (31.0 g/dL) after 7 weeks.
